function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor indoor air quality leading to health issues for building occupants","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory problems, allergies, and reduced productivity for occupants","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of HVAC systems, use of air purification systems, and monitoring indoor air quality","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, air purifiers, and HVAC maintenance tools","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building owners and facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate thermal comfort causing discomfort and reduced productivity for occupants","Impact":"Decreased productivity, discomfort, and potential health issues for occupants","Mitigation":"Proper insulation, HVAC system maintenance, and use of zoning and control systems for temperature regulation","Technologies":"Smart thermostats, insulation materials, and building automation systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building owners and facility management"},{"Description":"Insufficient visual comfort leading to eye strain, fatigue, and reduced cognitive performance for occupants","Impact":"Eye strain, fatigue, reduced cognitive performance, and discomfort for occupants","Mitigation":"Proper lighting design, use of natural light, and glare control measures","Technologies":"Energy-efficient lighting, daylighting systems, and glare control devices","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building owners and facility management"}]}
